message.content: Yes, the authors state the full set of assumptions of all theoretical results in the main paper and the appendices. They have provided detailed assumptions for Algorithm 1 and the convergence bounds in the main paper (H1-H4) and the supplementary material (A1-A8). Also, the authors establish Theorem 1 and Theorem S2 using these assumptions, outlining their conditions and providing supporting lemmas and proofs.

Yes, the authors state the full set of assumptions of all theoretical results in the main paper and the appendices. They provide detailed assumptions (H1-H4) in the main paper, while more technical assumptions (A1-A8) are presented in the appendices (appendix_1 and appendix_2). The level of detail provided supports a comprehensive understanding of the underlying theory and results.

Yes, the authors state the full set of assumptions of all theoretical results in both the main paper and the appendices. The main paper includes assumptions H1-H4, and the appendix contains additional assumptions A1-A8. The paper also provides convergence bounds and supports the results with proofs in the appendices, which rely on these stated assumptions.
